column5: Don't know whether to thank you or give you a kick in the  .   OK............ thanks, nice to see the flowers bloom. Need a little bit of that to know it is coming soon. Days are getting longer.
aaahhhh gee thanks for the flowers...but you shouldn't have I prefer chocolate
Hmmm....I got all excited...looked outside and all I saw was snow.  Good to see it's coming though....but I cant get too excited as Toronto is under an extreme cold alert tonite....LOL.
I say the later. No need to rub it in while the rest of us have to suffer.
You guys have Wal-Marts down there too? They're spreading south faster than I thought they ever would.

~~~Who else wants to get together and drive down there just give the OldDog a good kick in the  ~~You know some of us enjoy the cold weather Phishen, but there seems to be a lot of ummm gosh hate to say it sounds dirty to me B  Phishermen on this site, now I have to go and wash my phingers, for typing that UGH
Now...........yer just gettin' nasty.
No, no it won't, I just plugged in the block heater and battery blanket on my truck not 20 minutes ago.
Battery blanket? I just plugged in my bed blanket...

Wussy,   :D  I kinda figgered the heat generation from that big plasma you own would heat the whole house, and the surrounding foundation!!!!!!!!!! I know the ones we have at work can generate a lot of heat. Darn near have the scar tissue to prove it.
LOL>>>> See you Friday night if you're not heading out early Saturday. It's supposed to be a balmy -4 Saturday. Have fun...
OOPS!!!!!!!! Forgot Dan, you are living in the "floodplain", cold air sinks, warm air rises,   :D  :D You know that physics.
Cant say that i miss the the Canadian winters.
Was clearing out a fence row yesterday and found some green plants under the leaves and the swamp maple has red buds on it.Calling for snow Friday though. Joe
Glen and Joe, Have either of you been told yet today? LOL  That stuff is a looong way off around these parts, but as already mentioned, the days are getting longer, so there is hope!

Argh...I wish I could say the same her in Toronto.  As CCMT mentioned, we are under an extreme cold alert with temps dropping to -13C and -20C with windchill.  There is yet another snow storm forcasted to hit the GTA mid next week.  This winter seems like its never going to end...  I wouldn't be surprised if there was still snow out when I pick up my new/used boat in April!
You are an evil,evil man!    I'm really getting sick of this crap. Can I please win the lottery now?
certain SI issue is the early sign of spring for me

Can't give up the better deer hunting & smallmouth fishing. The musky fishing in Lake St. Clair & the spring walleye run in the Detroit River would be hard to give up. Plus a Yankee like me wouldn't be too welcome down there.    I always did get some strange looks when I would stop on my drive down to Florida. Getting passed by a semi on the highway while I'm doing 85-90 mph is a like scary too.  If the economy in Michigan doesn't get better soon I may have to move down your way. Wouldn't be able to sell my house though.
Thanks for the peek into spring Glen. Think I'll drive down myself and have a look this weekend.  Mike
